modName: Skyrim cinematic series Into the Darkness Trailer
summary: The trailer for my upcoming 4 episode cinematic series using the creation kit and mods to achieve an authentic viewing experience
descriptionHtml:
Set in the homeland of the Khajiit, this is a story of vengeance, heroes and a great battle against evil

It will be 4 episodes long, fully voice acted and made using mods and the creation kit to make it as authentic as possible



[youtube]QIIhAGQmIRQ[/youtube]
author: thelonewarrior
